name: Import profile
save profile
function 12

format:
<script>
(function() {
    
    (function(scope) {
        scope.$watch('msg', function(msg) {
            if (msg.button == 'true'){
                scope.msg.button = "false";
                const fanSettings = msg.payload;
                const json = JSON.stringify({fanSettings}, null, 2);
                const blob = new Blob([json], { type: "application/json" });
                const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);
                const link = document.createElement("a");
                link.href = url;
                link.download = "FanControlProfile.json";
                document.body.appendChild(link);
                link.click();
                document.body.removeChild(link);

            }
        });
    })(scope);
})();
</script>
